headline: A Look At Principal Financial Group (PFG) Valuation As Market And DCF Views Diverge
summary: Why Principal Financial Group is on investors’ radar today Principal Financial Group (PFG) is drawing fresh attention after recent price moves, with the stock last closing at $90.29. That puts current performance in focus alongside its recent month and past 3 months returns. See our latest analysis for Principal Financial Group.
